Food Counter Attendant job - SASKATOON - J&L Restaurant Partnership
Food Counter Attendant (Expired) J&L Restaurant Partnership SASKATOON Job Order Details Food Counter Attendant Print This Job Email a Friend Information en fran??ais Job Order #: 5123903 Employer Name: J&L Restaurant Partnership Wage/Salary Info: $10.72 per hour. Posted Date: 01/31/2011 Location: SASKATOON # of Positions: 30 Employment Terms: Full Time Experience: No Experience How to Apply?: Fax Resume or Apply in Person Description J&L Restaurant Partnership o/a Tim Hortons Fast Food Restaurant is hiring Food Counter Attendants We are seeking 30 Food Counter Attendants for Full Time / Shift Work ? Early Morning, Evening,&Overnights&Weekends for $10.72 per hour. Main duties of the job: Take customers' orders; Assemble and prepare food and food orders; Portion and wrap food or place it directly on plates for service to patrons, and package take-out food; Serve customers at counters or drive thru windows; Stock refrigerators and keep records of the quantities of food used; Receive payment for food items purchased; General housekeeping duties; For additional duties please set up a meeting/interview to review job description. No experience needed. No education needed. Please apply by fax or walk in. (information below) 16-33rd St. E. Saskato.... Found at Saskjobs.ca on 2011-02-01 07:00:17
